description: Try our easy to follow Kellogg's Rice Bubbles Mars Bar Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kellogg's Rice Bubbles Mars Bar Slice
name: Kellogg's Rice Bubbles Mars Bar Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place milk chocolate in a medium heatproof bowl. Place bowl over a medium saucepan of simmering water (don't let water touch the base of the bowl); stir until chocolate is melted and smooth. Spread evenly over the cooled slice. Refrigerate for approx. 2 hours or until set before cutting into small pieces.

Spread evenly over the cooled slice. Refrigerate for approx. 2 hours or until set before cutting into small pieces.
